Module com.example.c195
Package DAO

Class AppointmentDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDaoImpl
public class AppointmentDaoImpl extends Object
This class creates the Appointment database methods.

  • Method Details

    • getAppointmentUserID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentUserID(int userID) throws SQLException, Exception
      This is the method to create an ObservableList of appointments containing the User ID. This method executes an SQL query to find all appointments containing the User ID and then adds the appointments to the ObservableList userIDAppointments.
      Parameters:
      userID - the userID to get the appointment of
      Returns:
      the ObservableList userIDAppointments containing appointments with the User ID
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments() throws SQLException, Exception
      This is the method to create an ObservableList to get all appointments. This method executes an SQL query to find all appointments and then adds the appointments to the ObservableList allAppointments.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList allAppointments with all appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime appointmentStart, LocalDateTime appointmentEnd, Timestamp createDate, String createdBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdateBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      This is the method to add an appointment. The method executes an SQL query to insert a new Appointment into the Appointments table of the database using the data inputted on the AppointmentsAdd screen.
      Parameters:
      appointmentTitle - the title of the appointment to add
      appointmentDescription - the description of the appointment to add
      appointmentLocation - the location of the appointment to add
      appointmentType - the type of the appointment to add
      appointmentStart - the start of the appointment to add
      appointmentEnd - the end of the appointment to add
      createDate - the create date of the appointment to add
      createdBy - the user creating the appointment to add
      lastUpdate - the last updated time of the appointment to add
      lastUpdateBy - the last user to update the appointment to add
      customerID - the customer ID of the appointment to add
      userID - the user ID of the appointment to add
      contactID - the contact ID of the appointment to add

    • modifyAppointment

      public static void modifyAppointment(int appointmentID, String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime appointmentStart, LocalDateTime appointmentEnd, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdateBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      This is the method to modify an appointment. The method executes an SQL query to update an existing Appointment in the Appointments table of the database using the data inputted on the AppointmentsModify screen.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to modify
      appointmentTitle - the title of the appointment to modify
      appointmentDescription - the description of the appointment to modify
      appointmentLocation - the location of the appointment to modify
      appointmentType - the type of the appointment to modify
      appointmentStart - the start time of the appointment to modify
      appointmentEnd - the end time of the appointment to modify
      lastUpdate - the last updated time of the appointment to modify
      lastUpdateBy - the last user to update the appointment to modify
      customerID - the customer ID of the appointment to modify
      userID - the user ID of the appointment to modify
      contactID - the contact ID of the appointment to modify

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(int appointmentID)
      This is the method to delete an appointment. The method executes an SQL query to delete an existing Appointment in the Appointments table of the database with the selected Appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to delete

    • deleteApptCustID

      public static void deleteApptCustID(int customerID, int appointmentID)
      This is the method to delete an appointment when a customer is deleted. The method executes an SQL query to delete an existing Appointment in the Appointments table of the database with the selected Customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer being deleted
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to delete

    • typeAppt

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointmentType> typeAppt() throws SQLException
      This is the method to create the ObservableList typeAppt with only the distinct appointment types. The method executes an SQL query to select only the distinct Type strings from the Appointments table.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList typeAppt with only the distinct appointment types
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • countMonthType

      public static int countMonthType(appointmentType selectedType, String month) throws SQLException
      This is the method to count the number of appointments with both the selected type and the selected month. The method executes an SQL query to count from the Appointments table where the selected type and the selected month are in an appointment.
      Parameters:
      selectedType - the type of appointment to count
      month - the month for which to count
      Returns:
      the number of appointments with both the selected type and the selected month
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAppointmentsContactID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsContactID(int selectedContactID) throws SQLException, Exception
      The Lambda filters appointments based on Contact ID
      Parameters:
      selectedContactID - the contact ID by which to filter appointments
      Returns:
      the ObservableList contactList of appointments containing the Contact ID
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • getCurrentMonthAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCurrentMonthAppointments() throws SQLException, Exception
      This is the method to create the ObservableList currentMonthAppointments with only appointments with start timestamps within the current month. The method executes an SQL query to select only appointments in the Appointments table where the month of the start attribute matches the current month.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList currentMonthAppointments of appointments this month
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • getCurrentWeekAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCurrentWeekAppointments() throws SQLException, Exception
      This is the method to create the ObservableList currentWeekAppointments with only appointments with start timestamps within the current week. The method executes an SQL query to select only appointments in the Appointments table where the week of the start attribute matches the current week.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList currentWeekAppointments of appointments this week
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • countCustAppt

      public static int countCustAppt(int customerID) throws SQLException
      This is the method to count the number of appointments with the selected Customer ID. The method executes an SQL query to count from the Appointments table where the selected Customer ID is in an appointment.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the customer ID to count appointments for
      Returns:
      the number of appointments containing the Customer ID
      Throws:
      SQLException
